description: Alternately append n-th prime to end or beginning of previous term.
references: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
mathematica: a = {2}; For[n = 2, n < 30, n++, If[EvenQ[n], AppendTo[a, FromDigits[ Join[IntegerDigits[a[[ -1]]],IntegerDigits[Prime[n]]]]], AppendTo[a, FromDigits[Join[ IntegerDigits[Prime[n]], IntegerDigits[a[[ -1]]]]]]]]; a (* _Stefan Steinerberger_, Jun 17 2007 *)
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
